summary: Cache-busting CSS deployed to fix sidebar visibility in regular browser tabs

problem_solved.issue: Sidebar was visible in incognito but hidden in regular browser tabs
problem_solved.root_cause: Browser caching old CSS that was hiding the sidebar
problem_solved.solution: Added cache-busting version parameter using timestamp
problem_solved.implementation: CSS now includes `data-version` attribute with current timestamp

technical_details.effect: Forces browsers to treat CSS as new content on each page load
technical_details.deployment: Updated app_new_workflow.py and restarted Streamlit service

expected_behavior.regular_browser_tabs: Sidebar should now be visible after refresh
expected_behavior.incognito_mode: Sidebar should continue to work as before

regular_browser: Refresh the page in your regular browser tab
Verify sidebar appears on the left side
Check for black background and About card
Confirm no hide buttons are visible
if_still_issues: Wait 1-2 minutes for CDN cache to expire (if applicable)

immediate: Test sidebar visibility in regular browser tabs
Verify all sidebar features are working
monitoring: Monitor for any CSS loading issues
Check if version parameter causes any performance impact
